author: Muhammad Irsan (2009)
notes: \Kajian Geografi Dialek Bahasa Besemah di Kabupaten Lahat\". Master's Thesis of Facuty of Humanities (Linguistics Study Programme)
problems: University of Indonesia. Additional data is from : A Conservative Vowel Phoneme Inventory of Sumatra: The Case of Besemah
column14: The data was not collected by a single person. The phoneme \r\" in some dialects are realized as \"ɣ\"."
